project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python script that generates a random password with configurable length, including uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.

task.name: Define a mechanism to allow the user to specify the password length
Ensure the generated password includes uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters
Write tests to validate the password generation function
Execute tests to ensure the password generator works correctly
